description.zh-cn: 位于太平洋西南部的岛国，是英联邦王国新西兰王国的主体部分，为南半球的发达国家。
description.en: An island country in the southwestern Pacific Ocean, the main part of the Realm of New Zealand, a Commonwealth realm, and a developed country in the Southern Hemisphere.

description.zh-cn: 现任英国君主，同时兼任新西兰君主，为新西兰的国家元首。
description.en: The current monarch of the United Kingdom, who also serves as the Monarch of New Zealand and is the head of state of New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰君主立宪制下的国家元首职位，由英国君主兼任。
description.en: The head of state position under New Zealand's constitutional monarchy, held by the monarch of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 现任新西兰总督，作为新西兰君主在该国的代表。
description.en: The current Governor-General of New Zealand, representing the Monarch of New Zealand in the country.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰君主在该国的代表职位。
description.en: The representative of the Monarch of New Zealand in the country.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰政治人物，现任新西兰总理，新西兰国家党党魁。
description.en: A New Zealand politician, currently serving as the Prime Minister of New Zealand and leader of the New Zealand National Party.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The head of government position in New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰的主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，历史上曾是殖民新西兰的宗主国。
description.en: A European country, historically the colonial power that colonized New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 1840年由英国皇室与毛利人签订的条约，标志着新西兰成为英国殖民地，是新西兰的建国文献。
description.en: A treaty signed in 1840 between the British Crown and the Māori people, which marked New Zealand's becoming a British colony and is the nation's founding document.

description.zh-cn: 一个由北岛部分毛利部落组成的邦联，是《怀唐伊条约》的签署方之一。
description.en: A confederation of some Māori tribes from the North Island, one of the signatories of the Treaty of Waitangi.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰的原住民，属于波利尼西亚人的一支。
description.en: The indigenous people of New Zealand, a branch of the Polynesians.

description.zh-cn: 19世纪中期在新西兰发生的英国殖民者与毛利人之间因土地问题引发的一系列武装冲突。
description.en: A series of armed conflicts in the mid-19th century in New Zealand between British colonists and Māori over land issues.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰政治人物，曾于1999年至2008年担任新西兰总理，是该国第一位民选女性总理。
description.en: A New Zealand politician who served as Prime Minister of New Zealand from 1999 to 2008, and was the country's first elected female prime minister.

description.zh-cn: 2019年3月15日在新西兰基督城的两座清真寺发生的恐怖袭击事件，造成51人死亡。
description.en: A terrorist attack that occurred at two mosques in Christchurch, New Zealand, on March 15, 2019, resulting in 51 deaths.

description.zh-cn: 基督城清真寺枪击案的主犯。
description.en: The main perpetrator of the Christchurch mosque shootings.

description.zh-cn: 指性别相同的两人间的婚姻关系。
description.en: Refers to a marriage between two people of the same sex.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰毛利人的传统表演艺术，尤以战舞闻名。
description.en: A traditional performance art of the Māori people of New Zealand, particularly famous as a war dance.

en: New Zealand national rugby union team

description.zh-cn: 代表新西兰参加国际联合式橄榄球比赛的男子国家队，以赛前表演哈卡舞闻名。
description.en: The men's national team representing New Zealand in international rugby union, famous for performing the Haka before matches.

description.zh-cn: 争取女性获得选举权的社会政治运动。
description.en: The socio-political movement to grant women the right to vote.

description.zh-cn: 由新西兰君主担任国家元首的整个区域，包括新西兰、库克群岛、纽埃、托克劳和罗斯属地。
description.en: The entire area in which the Monarch of New Zealand is head of state, comprising New Zealand, the Cook Islands, Niue, Tokelau, and the Ross Dependency.

description.zh-cn: 查尔斯三世作为英国君主，兼任新西兰君主，是新西兰的国家元首。
description.en: As the monarch of the United Kingdom, Charles III also serves as the Monarch of New Zealand, the country's head of state.

description.zh-cn: 辛迪·基罗是现任新西兰总督。
description.en: Cindy Kiro is the current Governor-General of New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰总督是新西兰君主在该国的代表。
description.en: The Governor-General of New Zealand is the representative of the Monarch of New Zealand in the country.

description.zh-cn: 克里斯托弗·卢克森是现任新西兰总理。
description.en: Christopher Luxon is the current Prime Minister of New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 克里斯托弗·卢克森是新西兰国家党的成员，并担任党魁。
description.en: Christopher Luxon is a member of the New Zealand National Party and serves as its leader.

description.zh-cn: 英国是《怀唐伊条约》的签署方之一。
description.en: The United Kingdom was one of the signatories of the Treaty of Waitangi.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰联合部落是《怀唐伊条约》的签署方之一。
description.en: The United Tribes of New Zealand was one of the signatories of the Treaty of Waitangi.

description.zh-cn: 《怀唐伊条约》的签订使新西兰成为英国的殖民地，是新西兰的建国文献。
description.en: The signing of the Treaty of Waitangi made New Zealand a British colony and is considered the nation's founding document.

description.zh-cn: 在1845年至1872年的新西兰土地战争中，英国殖民者与毛利人发生武装冲突。
description.en: During the New Zealand Wars from 1845 to 1872, British colonists and Māori people were engaged in armed conflict.

description.zh-cn: 这场战争导致毛利人大量伤亡，且约1.6万平方公里的土地被没收。
description.en: This war resulted in significant Māori casualties and the confiscation of approximately 16,000 square kilometers of their land.

description.zh-cn: 1999年，海伦·克拉克成为新西兰第一位民主选举的女性总理。
description.en: In 1999, Helen Clark became New Zealand's first democratically elected female Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 布伦顿·塔兰特是基督城清真寺枪击案的主犯。
description.en: Brenton Tarrant was the main perpetrator of the Christchurch mosque shootings.

description.zh-cn: 1893年，新西兰成为世界上第一个给予妇女投票权的国家。
description.en: In 1893, New Zealand became the first country in the world to grant women the right to vote.

description.zh-cn: 2013年，新西兰成为亚太区第一个合法化同性婚姻的国家。
description.en: In 2013, New Zealand became the first country in the Asia-Pacific region to legalize same-sex marriage.

description.zh-cn: 哈卡舞是毛利人的传统表演艺术。
description.en: The Haka is a traditional performance art of the Māori people.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰国家橄榄球队“全黑队”在比赛前常表演哈卡舞，使其广为人知。
description.en: The New Zealand national rugby union team, the 'All Blacks', often perform the Haka before their matches, making it widely known.

description.zh-cn: 纽西兰是新西兰王国的主体部分。
description.en: New Zealand is the main part of the Realm of New Zealand.
